description: This file contains a JUnit test class for the Spring Boot application 'InternetBankingApiGatewayApplication'. It is used to verify that the application context loads correctly in a test environment.

classes.name: InternetBankingApiGatewayApplicationTests
classes.description: Test class for verifying the loading of the Spring Boot application context.

methods.name: contextLoads
methods.description: A test method that checks whether the application context loads successfully.
